fields.headline: 'School buildings need millions more spent'
fields.bodyText: In the late 1960s and early 70s, I was involved with a company which was starting the construction of four new school buildings (large schools) a week! In the 80s and 90s I was involved myself in about £1m worth of refurbishment of school buildings (under a Conservative government). Now, sadly, I am lucky if I am involved in a tenth of this amount. Yet school buildings are in need of spending running into millions if they are to look the part where teachers and children are pleased to walk in the door in the morning.
